DOC.brief_summary: This study randomizes St. Louis men to home-based STD screening or clinic-based STD screening. Home-based screening will be completed through the mail and clinic-based screening in a local clinical setting. We hypothesize that men randomized to home-based screening will be more likely to complete screening.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial of Home Versus Clinic-Based STD Testing
DOC.criteria: Men Ages 1845 Residing in St. Louis City or County Englishspeaking
